formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'GROUP_COUNT' =-
[Syntax] GROUP_COUNT([groupname][@category])
[Synopsis] Counts the number of channels in the specified group
[Description] Calculates the group count for the specified group, or uses the channel's current group if not specifed (and non-empty).
